title: Oil review. No. 13
creator_credit: Greenpark Productions, Film Producers Guild and Humphrey Swingler
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: 1. Oil for Switzerland: describing the journey of an oil barge up the River Rhine from the Dutch port where it loads to the Swiss river port where it discharges its cargo. 2. Go-devil: an instrument transmitted through oil pipes to locate blockages.
creator_credit_for_label: Greenpark Productions, Film Producers Guild and Humphrey Swingler
